Tree Services Fort Lauderdale FL

We understand the importance of healthy trees. Trees provide shade, improved air quality, and increased property value. But, trees can also pose a danger to people and property when they are not maintained. That's where we come in.

Our team of arborists provides a wide range of tree services to meet your needs. Whether you need tree trimming, tree removal, stump grinding, or emergency tree services, we have the skills and expertise to get the job done.

Our most popular tree service in Fort Lauderdale is tree trimming. Trees need to be pruned regularly to ensure their health and safety. Overgrown branches can become a hazard during storms, and can also damage your property. Regular tree trimming can also improve the aesthetic appeal of your property.

FREE No Obligation Estimate!

Broward County

Another important service we offer in Broward County is tree removal. While we strive to preserve healthy trees, sometimes it's necessary to remove them due to disease, storm damage, or other factors. Our team of experts can safely remove trees of all sizes and types, without causing damage to your property.

We also offer stump grinding services, which involve removing the stump left behind after a tree is removed. Stumps can be unsightly and can also attract pests and other unwanted visitors. Our team can grind down the stump and roots, leaving your property looking neat and clean.

In addition to our regular tree services, we also offer emergency tree services. We understand that storms and other unexpected events can cause trees to fall and become a hazard. That's why we offer 24/7 emergency tree services to ensure that your property is safe and secure. Our team of experts can quickly remove fallen trees and branches, allowing you to get back to your daily routine as soon as possible.

We are dedicated to keeping your trees healthy and safe. Contact us today for a free estimate.

Here are some additional benefits of choosing Affordable Tree Services:

  • We are insured and bonded, so you can be sure that your property is protected.
  • We have the latest equipment and technology, so we can get the job done quickly and efficiently.
  • We are fully licensed and permitted, so you can be sure that we are qualified to do the work.

Contact us today for all your tree service needs
